name: heroku-datadog-services
description: Establish Datadog monitoring of Heroku add-ons or other URL-based services

DD_HOSTNAME.description: Hostname for this agent; if blank, will be calculated from dyno name

DATABASE_URL.description: Set this or any other *_URL variable to have Datadog manage the service behind it, if supported

DATABASE_URL_TAGS.description: Tag metrics from DATABASE_URL with these tags; any *_TAG var will be applied to the corresponding service variable

ELASTICSEARCH_URL.description: Set this or any other *_URL variable to have Datadog manage the service behind it, if supported

ELASTICSEARCH_URL_TAGS.description: Tag metrics from ELASTICSEARCH_URL with these tags; any *_TAG var will be applied to the corresponding service variable
